author: Odeinoichus
title: Hula Magic!
review:
Set #71023 Hula Lula: Not seen very much on-screen, this particular character may or may not have been a former band-mate of Lucy. She includes a record and pink microphone for her accessories, features a brand-new hair element with some nice curls and colour choices and features a highly impressive upper torso print.

Her lower body is covered by a half-side cloth skirt while she has minimal printing on her feet and waist area to simulate traditional garb from this particular style of dress. She features two distinct smiling expressions, a wider smile and a more subdued normal type of smile with less visible teeth.

Overall Hula Lula isn't much to talk about, but she's a great figure. I'd definitely recommend her, it's just such a shame that there weren't as many memorable moments from the sequel to feature a lot of these unnamed characters. Recommended.
